Class GeoPermissions

java.lang.Object
  com.gmail.yuyang226.flickr.photos.geo.GeoPermissions

public class GeoPermissions
extends Object

Simple encapsulation of viewing permissions for geo data.

Author:
till (Till Krech - flickr:extranoise)
